name: Coinbase Balance Getter
description: Tool for getting the balance of a Coinbase wallet after restoring it
author: Shinkai

name.description: Identifier name for the Coinbase wallet to check balance for

privateKey.description: Private key for wallet authentication. Must be a valid hex string

walletId.description: Specific wallet ID to check balance for. If not provided, uses default wallet

useServerSigner.description: Enable server-side signing for transactions. Set to 'true' or 'false'

walletId.description: Override wallet ID from configuration. If provided, takes precedence over config walletId

message.description: Status message about the balance retrieval operation

balances.description: Map of token symbols to their respective balances

additionalProperties.description: Balance amount for a specific token
